data.title: Southwest Airlines Other Operating Income or Expenses 2010-2024 | LUV
data.meta_description:
Southwest Airlines annual/quarterly other operating income or expenses history and growth rate from 2010 to 2024. Other operating income or expenses can be defined as the aggregate amount of all operating expenses either too small to report separately or that cannot be standardized into another Zacks field.
  • Southwest Airlines other operating income or expenses for the quarter ending June 30, 2024 were $-1.093B, a 14.33% increase year-over-year.
  • Southwest Airlines other operating income or expenses for the twelve months ending June 30, 2024 were $-4.202B, a 1.97% increase year-over-year.
  • Southwest Airlines annual other operating income or expenses for 2023 were $-3.999B, a 7.07% increase from 2022.
  • Southwest Airlines annual other operating income or expenses for 2022 were $-3.735B, a 56.02% increase from 2021.
  • Southwest Airlines annual other operating income or expenses for 2021 were $-2.394B, a 24.3% increase from 2020.
